overview: A couple goes for a walk in the park and plays backgammon on a bench. They don't go in person though. It's two screens "sitting" on a bench, with the couple chatting through the screens. They have a casual conversation, until the girl sees a foreign girl in her boy's room. The boy tries to cover them up. They fight, and the girl disconnects. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: Pentares
